reference.shortdesc: The wintitle element identifies named windows and dialogs.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The wintitle element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the user-interface domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the wintitle element is used to tag the name of the "Configuration Options" window:
example.codeblock: <step> <cmd>Click <uicontrol>Configure</uicontrol>.</cmd> <stepresult>The <wintitle>Configuration Options</wintitle> window opens with your last set of selections highlighted.</stepresult> </step>
